DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Bimosiamose Cream safe effective treatment plaque type psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Bimosiamose Cream Treat Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis plaque type psoriasis PASI score 515 At least 18 year age Written inform consent Active skin infection More 20 % Body Surface Area ( BSA ) affect psoriasis Use certain antipsoriasis medication treatment
